urls.title: What if… nature-based solutions provide the answer to both the climate and ecological crises? | Environment Analyst
urls.description: The scientific consensus is clear – we are facing both a climate emergency and associated ecological crisis, which the UK is trying to tackle through a number of approaches, including the 25-year E...

text:
Environment Analyst's #SustainabilityDeliveryGroup hosted an Expert Talk with @JacobsConnects @EnvAgency which explored the role #naturalcapital approaches and nature-based solutions can play in meeting #netzero #carbon targets.

Watch on-demand for free: https://t.co/xEDOJzFTrZ https://t.co/G9HuOa5STW

urls.title: Green finance: unlocking its potential for nature's recovery
